title: Media Player for Retail
desc: We need a network media player (software) for broadcasting in stores, malls, restaurants etc. with centralized control in each location/ Software must work for Windows, Android and Apple. Minimum Requirements (more functions will be expanded):1. Music must be stored on a Central server;2. Music is broadcast via a media player (FOR) every store and content can be different for each location;3. Music can be downloaded to a computer hard drive (cloud server) or other device running Windows, Android, Apple, installed in each store to continue to be fulfilled in the case of disconnection of Internet.4. Music should be protected from copying by the staff of the stores;5. The staff can select music from a directory on a Central server in user's personal account or to use ready-made playlists that are pre-selected;6. The staff must not be able to download music tracks of third-party;7. The marketing Department, as the staff should be able to upload, set the schedule of performance information and advertising for each store.8. The software should generate real-time reports on the broadcasting of songs and audio advertising clips, it should be possible to save reports in Excel format;9. The software should have the function of diagnosis  on each location, i.e. if the music suddenly stop playing on a specific location - software must send us a malfunction report;10. Each user should have the ability to connect the personal account on any device;For example, we would like to receive software with options that have players of companies such as [url removed, login to view] and [url removed, login to view] and https: //siriusxm. com.In our selection of the contractor, we will pay special attention to those who have already created such media players or have experience in this field.Willing to clarify requirements, consider ready-made products. Intellectual property rights should be transferred under the contract.Ready to answer any questions.  Ones again, above are the minimum requirements, in real time it would be bigger list + we would need future help and support on daily basis for an additional monthly fee.

title: Property Listing Website and native Androind / iOS Apps - 20/10/2017 10:36 EDT
desc: *What do you need help with?This project should both design and develop a property-listing website, and accompanying NATIVE Android and iOS apps, where homeowners are able to add their homes/rooms for temporary rents and customers are able to hire these homes using the online platforms.These software products (website and apps) must be developed in two languages 'Arabic' and 'English'.The functionalities offered on these products are very similar in content and complexity to those offered by [url removed, login to view] and homeaway.com.*What will the freelancer be doing?The freelancer(s) must deliver four major outputs in this project:1- A website (in Arabic and English) for short-term listing and booking of personal homes and properties2- A native Android app (in Arabic and English)3- A native iOS app (in Arabic and English)4- An admin panel to monitor accounts and advertisements (approve, add, delete ... etc)*** We do not want a hybrid app.*Some of the key functionalities of these artifacts include:1- A home page for signing up and signing in2- Pages for personal profiles, messages, bookings, property reviews, wishlist ... etc3- Pages for adding details and pictures about homes and properties by service providers and people4- Pages for viewing available properties, descriptions,5- Pages for booking (or canceling) the desired properties6- Pages for different payment methods ((paypal, credit cards, etc)) and invoices7- Pages for adding personal reviews and experiences8- Design of relevant and required UI elements on the front-page9- Conversion between currenciesFurther project details and requirements will be provided before signing the contract.*What qualities are needed to be successful?-Web Programming Skills, Database Programming,-Graphics Design,- Android Programming, IOS Programming,-Experience implementing Arabic language both at the front end and back end fronts is a MUST (Remember Arabic is written Right to Left).

desc: We are expecting an on demand service providing app. All the relevant information regarding the app is followed by:✔	Users have to sign up with their mobile number or email to use this app. Every user can enjoy the trial service for 3 days for free after signing up.The users who are monthly users, are the main users and the those who will use for free for 3 days trial, are the guest users. Map will show our delivery man’s icon and smartshop’s location with shop icon. In the app there will be a message box where the users can order anything he/she wants by clicking on the option. This service doesn’t allow freelancing. We will have our own deliverymen recruited for the job.✔	Only the users can see deliveryman’s location. But the deliverymen can’t. So only the location of deliverymen will be tracked.✔	Some extra feature like promo code, notification, reference etc will be added too.

title: Kik Messenger Auto Responder And Kik Mass Messenger
desc: Im looking for Kik Messenger Auto Responder / And Kik Mass Messenger (To Send Messages From My Accounts To Users From The List)!!Please note that I am looking to buy the source code and working application of someone who has developed a Kik Messnger and autoresponder software of these characteristics. The reason is that I dont want to spend time, effort and more money developing a new version when good working existing versions already exist. I am interested in buying the application from you and the source code. The application must be fully working and with well written code. Finally you need to test the application fully to make sure that its working optimally before selling it and make necessary adjustments if not. !!Kik autoresponder:-Set account (username:pass from .txt file)-Set proxy (to assign proxy with your account)-Set messages to autorespond) - 1 line, 1 message < Spintax support < Add image from the root folder, add video from the root support (Kik has a function to upload image/video/etc from mobile to chat)-Set delays (in seconds) between autoresponds/messages (1 message - 1 delay function (in seconds)) For example:message 1 > 2 seconds waiting time > message 2 > 5 seconds waiting time)-Autoresponder should automatically start to autorespond/message people (from messages list that i have set in format) if you get a new first message/get added to contacts from a person.For example:Stranger: Hi! What's your name?Autoresponder: Hello, my name is.../2 seconds delay between messagesAutoresponder: Monica, how are you?/2 seconds delay between messagesAutoresponder: Hey this is me (after sending "Hey this is me" will be able to send image/video)...autoresponder keeps sending messages from the listIn conclusion: if auto responder account gets a first new message from a person > it starts to auto respond messages from a .txt file with delays in seconds set. and also will be able to send pictures/videosKik Mass Messanger:-Set account (username:pass from .txt file)-Set proxy (to assign proxy with account)-Set messages to autorespond) - 1 line, 1 message < Spintax support < Add image from the root folder, add video from root support (Kik has a function to upload image/video/etc from mobile to chat)-Set delays (in seconds) between autoresponds/messages (1 message - 1 delay function (in seconds)) For example:message 1 > 2 seconds waiting time > message 2 > 5 seconds waiting time)-Multithreaded < to send messages for many people at the same time from the [url removed, login to view] list.-Bulk accounts support. For example: I load 20 Kik usernames (username:pass) and set 20 threads < so 20accounts will log on a different proxy and start sending messages. 30acc x threads=20 messages sent at time.-Username list to send messages for (a .txt file where the usernames appear in a row or separated in comas,so bot accounts will start taking the scraped usernames from the list and keep sending them new messages for them)In conclusion: Messenger accounts, keeps taking usernames from the list and keeps sending messages for them. Multithreaded is needed for sending messages for multiple people with spintax and proxies support at the same time.!!!Project notes: Kik api > [url removed, login to view]Seeking bids, rates, and payment terms from serious developers only. There is opportunity for an ongoing partnership for additional support and future other projectsThanks for the time!

title: Develop Android App
desc: I want an app which enables auto forwarding of SMS received by one person to another number. The app has to work in background and will auto detect that sms has arrived and check its format that its the one which needs to forwarded or not. If the sms is to be forwarded than it will auto forward without any action from the user and without opening of app.I has two fixed formats. user can select the format which it want to forward and then number on which it is to be forwarded. User can also select the sim on which sms is received and the sim through which it is to be forwarded.For example -1st Combination -  Forward SMS of format-1 received from SIM 2 to mobile no. 9999999999 through SIM 22nd Combination - Forward SMS of format-2 received from SIM 2 to mobile no. 8888888888 through SIM 1User can also add more than one combination.See the attached sheet for details and working.The app will work as follows1) A professional can purchase our plan and add his number and additional four numbers. (You didn't need to do anything about it. It will happen on our website)2) After installing app, we will ask user his business name (only for first time and it will not be saved on server)3) Then second screen comes. Now user can click on button above and add a number to which sms needs to be forwarded. Here he can select the sim on which message can come. He can select both sim also. Number can also be added from his contact list. And he select the sim from which to send sms.4) Now we will check the number that it exists in our database or not. If it exists in our database then it will be added in his app.Otherwise user will be given an option to purchase our app via in app purchase.If user has a single sim phone then we did not ask for received from and send to SIM.The basis of app is the format of sms, not the number from which it is received.

title: Mobile development -- 2
desc: I need  an iPhone/iPad app.  I already have a design for it, I just need it to be built.  SCOPE FOR: UnderMiner®So you have a little character that's a miner, he starts ( spawns in a underground theme ) in the game, underground you can find stones, iron, redstone, gold, diamonds and emeralds. There are 30 levels in the game, the way you beat the game is by finding the emerald and mining it. The way you mine a block is by holding down on the block for 6 seconds. You can only mine blocks that are directly behind, in front and to the side. The way you move is by holding down on a space that hasn't got a block on it, remember the block needs to be next to you.Every time you complete a level you get coins. The way you get coins is by mining the other blocks that aren't the emerald onesStone = 3 coinsIron = 5 coinsRed stone = 10 coinsGold = 16 coinsDiamonds = 25 coinsEmerald = win levelThere is also a store where you can buy many different things.Pick axe level 2 = ( 5 seconds to mine a block ) 30 coinsPick axe level 3 = ( 4 seconds to mine a block )  80 coinsPick axe level 4 = ( 3 seconds to mine a block ) 210 coinsPick axe level 5 = ( 2 seconds to mine a block ) 380 coinsBomb = ( gets rid of all stone blocks for 3 levels ) 450 coinsDouble boost = ( doubles all the value of the blocks for 1 level ) 500 coinsIron emerald = ( every iron block for 2 levels has an emerald in it ) 1500 coinsAuto miner = ( an auto miner mines 5 blocks closest to you in 1 second ) 1670 coinsCake bomb = ( this cake bomb will direct you to a diamond close to the emerald ) 1890 coinsIn game real life purchases:Pick axe level 5 $10.00Bomb $19.00Double boost $ 25.00Iron emerald $ 45.00Auto miner $ 60.00Cake bomb $ 120.00500 coins $ 25.001100 coins $ 35.002000 coins $ 155.00If it is possible every level can the blocks be randomised but the emerald is harder to find every level ?The Normal store is located in the top right corner ( with a green square saying store )The in app purchases are located in the top left Conner ( with a red square saying in app purchases )END OF SCOPESimilar game link: Dig Out! by ZiMAD[url removed, login to view]

desc: We're looking to build a small app that is mainly a calling app. It will call from the phone list of contacts as well as manually entering phone number. The only differences with normal android caller app is: we want to display the calling cost average per minute for different sim card provider. Pricing will be provided in csv format. UI wireframe will also be provided as a rough guideline. For the design itself we would like to stick to android's material design standard. The difficult part that needs to be taken into consideration is different sim card provider will have different pricing based on area/city where you're calling from. So it might require to get the current location of the user.
